channel.title: CVE Feed for Endress+Hauser -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Endress+Hauser -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-12495|2024-09-16T18:19:18.832Z -- endress%2Bhauser -- rsg35%20-%20ecograph%20t
item.description: Endress+Hauser Ecograph T (Neutral/Private Label) (RSG35, ORSG35) with Firmware version prior to V2.0.0 is prone to improper privilege management. The affected device has a web-based user interface with a role-based access system. Users with different roles have different write and read privileges. The access system is based on dynamic "tokens". The vulnerability is that user sessions are not closed correctly and a user with fewer rights is assigned the higher rights when he logs on.

item.title: CVE-2024-6596|2024-09-10T08:01:26.429Z -- endress%2Bhauser -- echo%20curve%20viewer
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can run malicious c# code included in curve files and execute commands in the users context.

item.title: CVE-2024-6596|2024-09-10T18:46:17.099Z -- endress%2Bhauser -- echo%20curve%20viewer
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can run malicious c# code included in curve files and execute commands in the users context.
